body.p:
I have just got your letter. I got the other 2 this week dear Walt how sorry I was that you have such bad it makes the tears come in my eyes to think how bad it must be for you to be alone and have to come down 4 pair of stairs and be so feeble Walt if we ever live to have a little home if ever so humble I think you would feel better and I know I should I trust we shall be together some day dear Walt I feel sometimes if I was only well enough off to be independent of every body but Walt there is always something Walter dear your note in the other letter came all safe I have read it over 4 or 5 times and will burn it up now I pray god you may get your health and strength I am pretty well my mind I think
sometimes is worse than my body I doo do more than I am able to as Lou don't doo do any think thing except walk around and give orders she is down stairs she says she is afraid to doo do any thing for fear it will make her sick she thinks she is in the family way if she is and goes on this way I don't know how we shall stand the test the least little thing she gives way to and aunty pets her aunty has been here most six weeks and georgeGeorge carried her up and down stairs

Walter dear if you send the money next week for edd'sEdd's board maybe you had better direct the letter to george George at the foundry that is if you put it in a letter) I know Walt that we could live off of that and 20 a month good enough I have cloths clothes enough to last me as long as I live and edd Edd has got cloths clothes sufficient for a long time george George is busy quite his house is progressing not very fast as the man has other work to finish Walt write to me as often as you can give my love to Peter he comes to see you I have written to but have got no answer
